email_body: As far as lunch, it's a done deal. I need names of people who should be allowed. It is not for the whole floor, but rather for people who need to stay at their desk during the day. Please advise, John Enron North America Corp. From: Kori Loibl 09/28/2000 02:24 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Just wanted to say "thank-you" for dinner last night. It's unfortunate Errol and Dutch didn't make it, they are the ones who do all the work for you. Are you going to hook me up on the lunch police? Thanks again, Kori.
